scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Virginia Mines and Minerals Resource Collection holds a number of pamphlets with titles such as Minerals of Virginia from 1927 and Virginia's Minerals at War. Also present are bulletins with titles such as Mineral and Coal Studies From Virginia Tech and Virginia Geological Surveys. Newspaper clippings from the Roanoke Times, photographs taken in the year 1944, a Virginia Minerals Newsletter from 1977 and a map entitled Mineral Resources in Virginia are also found in this collection. Along with an executive order written in the year 1978 and documents such as Summary of Coal Mining in Virginia and Major Weaknesses of the Mining Law of Virginia.
